flatData.name: My Lovely Pets
flatData.description: Morgana gains a shield for 4 seconds and summon a swarm of bats that seek out the 4 closest enemies within 3-hexes, dealing magic damage to enemies below 25% Health.

flatData.name: King Bee's Judgement
flatData.description:
Passive: Gain 2 Ability Power for every Charm purchased.

Active: Veigar deals magic damage to the target.

flatData.name: Transcendence
flatData.description:
Syndra conjures a rift that deals magic damage and 30% Shreds the target for 5 seconds. This ability upgrades the more it is cast.

15 Casts: Enemies adjacent to the target are Shredded and take magic damage.
30+ Casts: For every 30 casts, creates an additional rift that deals 35% damage.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

flatData.name: Formless Blade
flatData.description:
Passive: On gaining Shield, Nilah gains a burst of 60% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

Active: Reposition up to 2 Hexes away, then deal phyiscal damage to enemies in a line through the target. Gain a Shield for 3 seconds.

flatData.name: Orb of Perception
flatData.description: Ahri fires an orb at the current target that deals magic damage. Launch 3 foxfires at enemies near the target, each dealing true damage. Gain an additional foxfire this combat.

flatData.name: Bouncing Bee
flatData.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bee at the farthest target, gaining 7% more damage for each bounce. Explodes on the first target hit or at the end of its life, dealing magic damage to enemies in a small area.

flatData.name: Snip Snip!
flatData.description:
Passive: Every 2 casts, Gwen gains a Snip! stack.

Active: Dash and snip twice plus once for every Snip! stack. Each snip deals magic damage in a cone.

flatData.name: Death Lotus
flatData.description:
Katarina blinks to the largest group of enemies within 2 hexes and deals magic damage over 3 seconds to all enemies within 2 hexes. The 2 nearest enemies take 155% increased damage. 

If she kills an enemy, blink and reposition again.

flatData.name: Get Excited!
flatData.description: Jinx gains 125 decaying Attack Speed for 5 seconds. For the duration, attacks fire rockets that deal physical damage and ignore 50% Armor.

flatData.name: Rampage
flatData.description:
Passive: On takedown of the current target, empower the next attack to deal physical damage. If the next target is out of range, charge to them.

Active: For the next 6 seconds, Hecarim attacks also cleave adjacent enemies for physical damage.

flatData.name: Fire Point Strike
flatData.description: Akali dashes to and strike the farthest enemy within 3 hexes, dealing physical damage to them. The next 3 attacks launch kunai at the target, dealing more damage.

flatData.name: Sharp Note
flatData.description: Seraphine fires a soundwave towards the longest line of enemies that deals magic damage, reduced by 20% for each target struck.

flatData.name: Snowfall
flatData.description:
Diana dashes within 2 hexes to hit the most enemies and heals herself. Excess healing becomes a 3 second Shield. Then, deal magic damage to adjacent enemies and magic damage to enemeis 2 hexes away.

Every 2 casts create a snowfall that Chills all enemies and heals all allies. Excess healing also becomes a 3 second Shield.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 20%

flatData.name: Eye of the Magus
flatData.description: Xerath launches 10 arcane blasts randomly split between the closest 5 enemies that each deal magic damage.

flatData.name: Learning to Fly
flatData.description:
Passive: Fly around and attack the nearest enemy.

Active: Gain Attack Speed and replace Smolder's attacks with fireballs that deal physical damage for 6 seconds.

Dragon Upgrade: Each fireball also heals 20 Health.

Active: Gain Attack Speed and replace Smolder's attacks launch fireballs that deal physical damage.

Dragon Upgrade: Next 6 attacks instead. Fireballs deal physical damage.

flatData.name: Portalpalooza
flatData.description: Norra launches a ball at the current target that explodes for magic damage, and colors the area for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage per second. If the ball lands in an area that is already colored, it will bounce to a new location within 2-hexes before exploding.

flatData.name: Hail of Hellfire
flatData.description: Varus fires a supernova at a cluster of enemies within Attack Range + 1 hexes that deals physical damage to the target and all adjacent enemies. It explodes into a cluster of fireballs, dealing initial damage as physical damage to all other enemies within three hexes.

flatData.name: Gleaming Quill
flatData.description: Rakan gains a Shield for 4 seconds and shoots 6 feathers in a cone, dealing magic damage to enemies they hit. Then land, granting allies within 2-hexes a Shield for 4 seconds.

flatData.name: Ragnarok
flatData.description:
Passive: Every 4 attacks or if not in range of the target, Olaf leaps at them and does a slam that deals physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies. 

Active: For the next 5 seconds, gain attack speed, 12% Omnivamp, and crowd control immunity.

flatData.name: Cyclone
flatData.description:
Combat Start: Gain 40 Armor and Magic Resistance. Lose 1 of each every second.

Active: Spin, gaining Shield for 4 seconds and dealing physical damage to each adjacent enemy.

flatData.name: Surprise!!!
flatData.description: Neeko transforms into a Crab for 2 seconds. Over the duration, regain 12% health and release scuttleblasts at 3 nearby allies and 3 nearby enemies. Allies hit are healed and enemies hit take magic damage and are stunned for some seconds.

flatData.name: Obliterate
flatData.description: Mordekaiser gains a Shield that decays over 2 seconds and slam the target, dealing magic damage in a 2-hex line. Gain 12% Damage Amp for the rest of combat.

flatData.name: Portalshot Barrage
flatData.description: Ezreal fires a blast in a wide line through the current target, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, reduced by 25% for each enemy it passes through. The first target hit takes an additional magic damage. If an enemy is adjacent, blink to safety before firing.

flatData.name: Traveling Whimsy
flatData.description: Bard launches a magic missile at the target that bounces 4 times between enemies dealing magic damage to enemies hit. They also take 10% more damage for 3 seconds.

flatData.name: Time Bomb
flatData.description: Zilean places a bomb on the current target, dealing magic damage and Stunning them for 1.2 seconds. When the stun ends or the target dies, the bomb explodes, dealing magic damage to the target and magic damage to adjacent enemies.

flatData.name: Explosive Charge
flatData.description: Tristana fires a cannonball at the target, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit. If the enemy hit is within 2 hexes of Tristana, they're knocked back 2 hexes and briefly stunned.

flatData.name: Dragon's Descent
flatData.description:
Shyvana transforms into dragon form and gain an aura that deals magic damage per second to adjacent enemies. Then fly through the largest group of enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them.

Dragon Upgrade: Double the size of the aura. It deals 30% more damage.

flatData.name: Hot-Tea
flatData.description:
For 3 seconds, Rumble gains damage reduction and create a cone of flame that deals magic damage over the duration and Wounds enemies for 5 seconds. 

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

flatData.name: Hive Ooze
flatData.description: Kog'Maw launches a honey wad through the current target, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Adjacent allies and allies hit by the trail are set abuzz, gaining Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

flatData.name: Nether Blade
flatData.description: Kassadin gains a shield for 3 seconds and stab into the current target, dealing magic damage. For the rest of combat, Kassadin's attacks deal bonus stacking magic damage.

flatData.name: Witch Fang
flatData.description: Cassiopeia empowers the next 3 attacks to deal magic damage.

flatData.name: Ravenous Hunter
flatData.description:
Passive: Warwick permantly gains 1% Attack Speed and movement speed for each enemy killed. Attacks heal for Health and deal bonus physical damage. 
Gain double the healing and physical damage for targets below 25% Health.

flatData.name: Fiery Sneeze
flatData.description:
Nomsy sneezes fire at the target, dealing physical damage. 50% of overkill damage is dealt to the closest 2 targets.

Dragon Upgrade: Overkill hits 4 targets.

flatData.name: Hammer Form
flatData.description:
Jayce transforms into melee form gaining Armor and Magic Resist, and replacing his Ability with Hammer Slam.

Hammer Slam: Leap to the current target, dealing physical damage.

flatData.name: Grandmaster-At-Arms
flatData.description: Jax deals magic damage to adjacent enemies and gain Armor and Magic Resist for 6 seconds. During this time, Attacks deal bonus magic damage.

flatData.name: Dark Tidings
flatData.description: For the rest of combat, Ashe fires an additional arrow at a nearby enemy that deals** 30% AD + 5/8/12% AP** physical damage. This effect stacks.

flatData.name: Twilight Eruption
flatData.description: Shen gains Durability for 3 seconds. Create a volcanic rupture under the closest enemies which Stun for 1.5 seconds and deal magic damage.

flatData.name: Here It Comes!
flatData.description:
Milio opens his backpack, granting completed items to allies with open slots and throwing 3 knickknacks at enemies which each deal magic damage. If an ally has no room for items, they instead gain a stacking 11% damage increase for the rest of combat.

Occasionally finds something special in his backpack.

flatData.name: Certain Death
flatData.description:
Briar leaps to the largest group of enemies, dealing physical damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius and Stun them for 1.25 second. Then enter a frenzy, gaining Attack Speed, 15% Omnivamp, and causing attacks to deal bonus physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

If already frenzied, empower the next attack to chomp, dealing physical damage.

flatData.name: Hellhound
flatData.description: Nasus steals Health divided between the nearest enemies and reduce max mana by 10. Subsequent casts heal and deal 15% physical damage to Nasus' target.

flatData.name: Leviathan
flatData.description: Nami fires a bubble at the largest group of enemies within Nami's range, dealing magic damage.  Every 3rd cast, instead summons The Leviathan, dealing damage to enemies in a line and knocking them up.

flatData.name: Personal Space
flatData.description: Vex gains a Shield for 4 seconds, increased by 5% for each enemy targeting Vex. When it expires, deal magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

flatData.name: Blizzard
flatData.description: Swain transforms, gaining max Health. Subsequent casts release a cone of lightning towards the target, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and granting an additional max Health.

flatData.name: Ice Shard
flatData.description:
Twitch fires a shard of ice at the target that pierces through enemies hit, dealing physical damage, reduced by 10% for each target hit. Targets are 20% Sundered for 5 seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

flatData.name: Starfall
flatData.description: Soraka calls down a star on the target, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal a nearby ally. Heal increases if they're below 50% Health.

flatData.name: Lunge
flatData.description: Fiora leaps backward and brace, briefly gaining 70% damage reduction. Then, sweep through the most enemies within 2 hexes, dealing physical damage to each enemy plus split between all enemies hit.

flatData.name: Runic Portal
flatData.description: Ryze opens portals that fire bolts at nearby enemies. Each bolt deals magic damage.

flatData.name: Convergence
flatData.description:
Galio reduces incoming damage by 15 for 4 seconds. Fire two magic bolts that converge on the furthest enemy within 3 hexes, Stunning them for 1.2 seconds. Each bolt deals magic damage to enemies it passes through.

Mage casts will target a different enemy.

flatData.name: Borrowed Time
flatData.description: Karma attaches a temporal rift to the closest unaffected enemy for some seconds that deals magic damage over the duration. If they die while affected, the rift implodes into stardust, healing adjacent allies for % of the ally's max health.

flatData.name: Subject: Storm
flatData.description: Hwei paints a lightning bolt striking the target. After a short delay, the bolt strikes, dealing damage to the target and 40% of the damage to adjacent enemies. Every third cast, paint 2 extra bolts on the lowest percent Health enemies.

flatData.name: Rend
flatData.description:
Passive: Kalista attacks embed a spear in her target and every 3 attacks, embed a spear in nearby enemies.

Active: Leaps to safety and deals physical damage per spear to enemies with spears in them.

flatData.name: All Eyes on Me
flatData.description: Redirect all nearby projectiles into Taric and gain damage reduction for 4 seconds. At the end, release a nova that deals magic damage in a 2-hex area.

flatData.name: Trouble Bubble
flatData.description: Zoe kicks a bubble at her target, dealing magic damage. Reduce the target's Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

flatData.name: Spider Form
flatData.description:
Transform into a spider and cast Petrifying Venom on the target.

Petrifying Venom: Stun the target for 1.5 seconds, dealing  magic damage and healing Elise.

flatData.name: Temporal Anomaly
flatData.description:
Passive: On target death, hookshot to the lowest percent health enemy within 3 hexes and deal physical damage. After a hookshot or Ability cast, the next attack deals true damage.

Active: Camille knocks back and Stun enemies adjacent to the target for 1 seconds, dealing physical damage. Create a containment zone around the target for 4 seconds. Gain 30% Durability and 225% Attack Damage while in the zone.

flatData.name: Divination Dive
flatData.description: Tahm Kench dives below and surface next to the closest enemy, sending ripples towards the farthest enemy within 4-hexes. Enemies within two hexes, and those struck by the whirlpool take magic damage and are knocked up for some seconds.

flatData.name: Clean-Up Duty
flatData.description: Poppy gains a Shield for 3 seconds. Then, wallop the target for additional physical damage.

flatData.name: Sticky Bite
flatData.description:
Nunu bites the target, healing and dealing magic damage, and Chilling them for 3 seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 20%

flatData.name: Dream Bloom
flatData.description: Lillia heals, then deals magic damage to adjacent enemies.

flatData.name: Honey Barrier
flatData.description: Blitzcrank gains a Shield for 6 seconds. When it expires, deal magic damage split between the 2 closest enemies.

flatData.name: Willbreaker
flatData.description: After damaging a Shield, gain 50% Damage Amp for 3 seconds.

flatData.name: Sunlight Cape
flatData.description:
Every 1.5 seconds, deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 3 hexes for 30 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: reduces healing received

(Unique - only 1 per champion)

flatData.name: Rosethorn Vest
flatData.description:
Gain 15% max health.

Take 25% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by an attack, deal 175 magic damage to all adjacent enemies

Cooldown: 2 seconds

flatData.name: Equinox
flatData.description:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Grant 70 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 20 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

flatData.name: Demon Slayer
flatData.description: Abilities and attacks deal 50% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

flatData.name: Moonstone Renewer
flatData.description: Every 4 seconds, grant a 55-325 Shield (based on stage) to the 2 lowest percent health allies for 4 seconds.

flatData.name: Queenguard's Armor
flatData.description:
Gain 25% increased healing and shielding. Heal for 12% of the Queen's damage dealt.

*Only Faeries can hold this item. Bench the champion to remove it.*

flatData.name: Frying Pan
flatData.description: ... why else would it be here?

flatData.name: Tactician's Cape
flatData.description:
Your team gains +1 maximum team size.

10% chance to drop 1 Gold 1 after 10 seconds of combat.

flatData.name: Tactician's Shield
flatData.description:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold when the holder dies.

flatData.name: Warrior Emblem
flatData.description: The holder gains the Warrior trait.

flatData.name: Shapeshifter Emblem
flatData.description: The holder gains the Shapeshifter trait.

flatData.name: Scholar Emblem
flatData.description: The holder gains the Scholar trait.

flatData.name: Preserver emblem
flatData.description: The holder gains the Preserver trait.

flatData.name: Multistriker Emblem
flatData.description: The holder gains the Multistriker trait.

flatData.name: Mage Emblem
flatData.description: Unique: The holder gains the Mage trait.

flatData.name: Hunter Emblem
flatData.description: The holder gains the Hunter trait.

flatData.name: Bastion Emblem
flatData.description: The holder gains the Bastion trait.

flatData.name: Mogul's Mail
flatData.description: Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 5 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 35 times. At full stacks, continue gaining 1 gold every 9 seconds.

flatData.name: Spear of Hirana
flatData.description: Attack restore 20 additional Mana. Gain 50 Ability Power.

flatData.name: The Baron’s Gift
flatData.description: After casting an Ability, gain 120% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

flatData.name: Spear of Shojin
flatData.description: Attacks grant 5 bonus mana.

flatData.name: Nashor's Tooth
flatData.description: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

flatData.name: Adaptive Helm
flatData.description:
Combat Start: The holder gains bonuses based on their starting position. 
- Front Two Rows: 15 Ability Power and 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.
- Back Two Rows: 15 Ability Power and gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

flatData.name: Prowler's Claw
flatData.description: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within 4 hexes. The next two critical attacks deal 60% bonus critical strike damage.

flatData.name: Gold Collector
flatData.description:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their maximum Health. Executions have a 40% chance to drop 1 gold .

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

flatData.name: Fishbones
flatData.description: Doubles the holder's attack range, and causes each of their attacks to target a random enemy.

flatData.name: Statikk Favor
flatData.description: Every third attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 8 enemies, dealing 95 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

flatData.name: Hextech Lifeblade
flatData.description: The holder's damage heal them for 35% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

flatData.name: Blessed Bloodthirster
flatData.description:
Grant: 40% Omnivamp and 40 bonus AP.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 40% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

flatData.name: Rabadon's Ascended Deathcap
flatData.description: Gain 140 Ability Power and 33% bonus damage. It's witnessed - and unleashed - miracles and calamities both.

flatData.name: Glamorous Gauntlet
flatData.description: Gain 55 AP. Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

flatData.name: Covalent Spark
flatData.description:
Grant 200 HP. 50% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are alsol zapped for magic damage equal to 200% of their maximum Mana.

Also, regenerate 1% maximum Health per second

flatData.name: Fist of Fairness
flatData.description:
Grant 2 effects:
+50% Attack Damage and +50 Ability Power.
30% Omnivamp.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

flatData.name: Royal Crownshield
flatData.description: Combat start: Gain a 50% max health shield for 8 seconds. When the shields expires, gain 40 Ability Power.

flatData.name: Crownguard
flatData.description: Combat start: Shields the holder for 25% of their max health for 8 seconds. When the shield breaks or expires, gain 40 Ability Power.

flatData.name: Blue Blessing
flatData.description:
Max mana reduce by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 20% more damage for 12 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

flatData.name: Jak'sho the Protean
flatData.description:
Combat Start: The holder gains two effects, regardless of starting position.
- Front Two Rows: 60 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 2 Mana when struck by an attack.
- Back Two Rows: 40 Ability Power. Gain 20 Mana every 3 seconds.

flatData.name: Sterak's Gage
flatData.description: Once per combat at 60% Health, increase max health by 25% and gain 35% Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

flatData.name: Steadfast Heart
flatData.description: Take 8% less damage. While above 50% health, take 15% less damage instead.

flatData.name: Statikk Shiv
flatData.description: Grants 15 bonus Ability Power. Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 35 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds. (Direct damage item)

flatData.name: Red Buff
flatData.description:
Deal 6% bonus damage. Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

flatData.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
flatData.description: Grant 50 bonus Ability Power and 15% bonus Damage.

flatData.name: Last Whisper
flatData.description: Unique: Grant 10% bonus Attack Damage. Dealing physical damage from an attack or Ability reduces the target's Armor by 50% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

flatData.name: Ionic Spark
flatData.description: Gain 100 HP. Enemies within 2 hexes have 50% reduced Magic Resist. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana. (Direct damage item)

flatData.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
flatData.description: Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks!

flatData.name: Giant Slayer
flatData.description: Grant 15% bonus Attack Damage and 15 bonus Ability Power. Abilities and attacks deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

flatData.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
flatData.description: Gain 100 bonus HP. Start with 25 Armor & Magic Restistance. Gain +13 Armor and +13 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

flatData.name: Deathblade
flatData.description: Grant 50% bonus Attack Damage.

flatData.name: Blue Buff
